auto_confirm_threshold.description: Confidence score above which matches are auto-confirmed.

batch_size.description: Number of accounts processed per batch.

created_at.description: When the threshold configuration was created.

include_deactivated.description: Whether deactivated identities are included in matching.

manual_review_threshold.description: Confidence score above which matches go to manual review.

updated_at.description: When the threshold configuration was last updated.
